snippet.title: Slime Hero release on steam | indie game | shooter | causal | pixel
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2138400/Slime_Hero/

Slime Hero will release 2022.10.17, come and find your favorite Slime!

Slime Hero is a slime collecting and fighting game, you need to collect and select the best slime team to pass all the stage, after that you can go to challenge the boss, try to dodge all the attack and kick away all the enemy.

Game Feature
50 more slimes wait to be collected
defeat enemy with your slime team
evolve your favorite slimes
50 more attack mode to be found
no limitation personal team build
4 incredible stage for you to adventure
3 level of difficulty to be challenged
1 superior difficulty boss
10 more achievement to be collected

Slime Hero will give you a casual and relax gaming experience, just walk around slime world and have fun in the adventure with your favorite slime team.
